reviews.text:
üìçRomeo‚Äôs (Davidson)

Best customer service on top of some of the best pizza around.
Great place w always fresh ingredients.
Love this place it‚Äôs a weekly favorite (oops we had it 3 days this week)

-buffalo chicken pizza üçï: 10/10
Only complaint maybe smaller chicken pieces
-bacon pepperoni pizza: 20/10 our go to! Top tierüíï the crispy bacon the pepperoni cooked to perfection && the sauce ‚Äúthe sweet sauce‚Äù never gives me heartburn so I can eat their pizza w/ no regrets.

Ps I got a free pop which had my name on it bc I ordered 3 times this week how awesome was that I was given a free pop!

@romeo‚Äôs pizza Davidson

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è (Because 6 stars isn‚Äôt an option)

First of all, Robert ‚Äî the general manager, unofficial mayor, and possibly pizza therapist ‚Äî is one of the kindest, most personable humans to walk this Earth (and probably makes a mean pizza in Heaven too, but let‚Äôs not rush him). Every time I came in, he made me feel like royalty. Like I was about to dine on the sacred triangle of dough, sauce, and cheese blessed by the pizza gods themselves.

The service? Impeccable.
The food? So good it made me briefly consider proposing to a pepperoni slice.
The vibe? Think Italian hospitality meets neighborhood charm, with a dash of ‚Äúwhy doesn‚Äôt every place treat you like this?‚Äù

Romeo‚Äôs isn‚Äôt just a pizza place. It is a safe haven, a carb-filled escape from the chaos of life, and a reminder that yes ‚Äî there are still good people (and good crust) in the world.

Robert, if you‚Äôre reading this: thank you for going above and beyond. Wherever you land next, they better appreciate the magic you bring ‚Äî and if you ever decide to open Robert‚Äôs Pizzeria, just know I‚Äôll be the first in line with a slice-sized hole in my heart.

My all-time favorite pizza place comes to Charlotte and I couldn‚Äôt be happier! The sauce is amazing.

Also the GM was very kind and wonderful to chat with.

Go get some Pizza!

I use to live and Cleveland and I got Romeos all the time there.  It happened by accident that I came across this location and it didn't disappoint!  The pizza is just as amazing as I remeber with great service.  I highly recommend the pizza here!

My fianc√© and I love Romeo‚Äôs coming from Ohio but this location sucks. We drive 45 minutes just to get pizza from you guys and this is the second time in a row our order has been messed up. The first time I didn‚Äôt care but I won‚Äôt be going back here again. You can clearly tell from the order receipt and the pictures how messed up the pizzas are and I‚Äôm very disappointed since it was a taste of home. Don‚Äôt recommend.

editorial_summary.overview: Traditional pizzeria chain also serving loaded breadsticks, wings, subs, strombolis & calzones.

recentReviews.text:
üìçRomeo‚Äôs (Davidson)

Best customer service on top of some of the best pizza around.
Great place w always fresh ingredients.
Love this place it‚Äôs a weekly favorite (oops we had it 3 days this week)

-buffalo chicken pizza üçï: 10/10
Only complaint maybe smaller chicken pieces
-bacon pepperoni pizza: 20/10 our go to! Top tierüíï the crispy bacon the pepperoni cooked to perfection && the sauce ‚Äúthe sweet sauce‚Äù never gives me heartburn so I can eat their pizza w/ no regrets.

Ps I got a free pop which had my name on it bc I ordered 3 times this week how awesome was that I was given a free pop!

recentReviews.text:
My all-time favorite pizza place comes to Charlotte and I couldn‚Äôt be happier! The sauce is amazing.

Also the GM was very kind and wonderful to chat with.

Go get some Pizza!

recentReviews.author: Tristan Renner
recentReviews.text: My fianc√© and I love Romeo‚Äôs coming from Ohio but this location sucks. We drive 45 minutes just to get pizza from you guys and this is the second time in a row our order has been messed up. The first time I didn‚Äôt care but I won‚Äôt be going back here again. You can clearly tell from the order receipt and the pictures how messed up the pizzas are and I‚Äôm very disappointed since it was a taste of home. Don‚Äôt recommend.

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers have positive experiences overall. Your 4.2/5 rating from 5 recent reviews shows solid satisfaction with room for growth.

strengthsPerceived: Customers rave about the consistently fresh ingredients and unique "sweet sauce" that doesn't cause heartburn, making it a guilt-free indulgence. - social media marketing can showcase this strength

The exceptional customer service, particularly from the general manager Robert, makes customers feel like royalty and creates a welcoming atmosphere. - review management can highlight this positive aspect
The personalized touches, such as receiving a free pop for frequent visits, enhance customer loyalty and satisfaction. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
improvementOpportunities: Order accuracy issues - review management can address this concern
Negative reviews/reputation issues - review management can address this concern
Poor online visibility - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
